name: Better Balloon Juice
description: A cleaner look for John Cole's Balloon Juice (http://www.balloon-juice.com).  Compatible with BalloonJuice2013.
additional_info:
FEATURES:
  • No gaps between comment blocks
  • Comments use drab gray color theme instead of drab blue color theme
  • De-uglified headers, places post date is at top right
  • De-uglified header makes Troll Filter script look nicer too
  • Reply button is hidden by default and revealed on mouseover
CHANGES:
  • 2013-05-15: Updated for BJ's new 2013 look
